results.name: Smallest cube containing exactly n 6's.
comment: a(n)^(1/3) = A048371(n) is the index of the first occurrence of n in sequence A269246. - _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 21 2016
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..23
